channel.title: [508] SHOPS Buying + selling [508] [READ]
channel.description:
Well I play on a 525 server, it has an option where you can *SELL* items to a general store, this helps build a good economy.
Is there a way to do this on a 508 ( Fearny Pk Base)?
If there is, can you please reply with a valid answer? Thank you!
